main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported in the Eunice, New Mexico/Texas area in June 1958.
interesting points: The objects were described as orange and red in color, with green and black on the bottom, and resembling the size of a baseball.
The objects were observed visually from the ground and also detected on radar.
One object was reported to have a trail resembling jet exhaust and was moving northwest from Pecos, Texas.
The sightings occurred over a period of time, with the first reported on June 21, 1958 and the second on June 26, 1958.
Weather information, including wind speeds and directions, was provided for the time of the sightings.
sighted object: orange and red orbs, one with a trail resembling jet exhaust
witnesses: civilian observers, including a Mr. John E. Frick from Eunice, New Mexico
